Input.Description: Filter w/ DataObject initializer with constant value

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE (root = {"number": 12, "String_value": "12", "id": null, "Pk": null})
SELECT VALUE {"number": 12, "String_value": "12", "id": null, "Pk": null} FROM root

Input.Expression: query.Select(doc => IIF((doc.NumericField > 12), new DataObject() {NumericField = 12, StringField = "12"}, new DataObject() {NumericField = 12, StringField = "12"}))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ((root["NumericField"] > 12) ? {"number": 12, "String_value": "12", "id": null, "Pk": null} : {"number": 12, "String_value": "12", "id": null, "Pk": null}) FROM root

Input.Description: Filter w/ DataObject initializer with member initialization
Input.Expression: query.Where(doc => (doc == new DataObject() {NumericField = doc.NumericField, StringField = doc.StringField})).Select(b => "A")

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE "A" FROM root WHERE (root = {"NumericField": root["NumericField"], "StringField": root["StringField"]})
